verses.roman:
yei grāme rahi' bhikṣā karena yāṅra ghare
sei grāmera yata loka āise dekhibāre

synonyms: yei grāme—in whatever village; rahi'-staying; bhikṣā—alms; karena—accepts; yāṅra—whose; ghare—at home; sei—that; grāmera—of the village; yata loka—all the persons; āise—come; dekhibāre—to see.
translation: In whatever village Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu stayed to accept alms, many people came to see Him.
